1a1('dul ba): / 'dul ba tha bzhugs so//
1b1('dul ba): @##// rgya gar skad du/ bi na ya k+Shu dra ka bstu/ bod skad du/ 'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/ bam po dang po/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// phran
1b2('dul ba): tshegs kyi gzhi'i sdom ni/ so phag chan pa chos gos dang // shing tshad dang ni gnas brtan lus// rgyus pa 'gyod pa dbyung ba nyid// phran tshegs gzhir ni yang dag bshad//
1b3('dul ba): bsdus pa'i sdom ni/ so phag sen mo bcos pa dang // lhung bzed yan lag me long skyes// lam phran chu tshags mon sran sde'u// rkang pa bkru dang gos mdud do// sdom ni/
1b4('dul ba): so phag dang ni sa dkar dang // nya phyis dri yi lag ris dang // ka ba dang ni skud pa gnyis// lag rgyan dang ni sor gdub rgya// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na
1b5('dul ba): spre'u rdzing gi 'gram khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs so/ / drug sde rnams snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/ lhung bzed thogs te yangs pa can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa
2a1('dul ba): dang / yangs pa can gyi bar dang / khang pa brtsegs pa'i bar gyi bar skabs de na yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams kyi skyed mos tshal me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa/ bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pa dga'
2a2('dul ba): ba'i tshal dang 'dra ba de dag na de dag gi rtse ba dang / gar dang / glu dang / rol mo'i sgra'i cha byad sna tshogs dag dang / khrus kyi yo byad sna tshogs dag kyang bzhag pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga' bo/ yangs pa can
2a3('dul ba): gyi lits+tsha bI 'di dag dang / skyed mos tshal gyi dga' ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi dper mdzad na/ re zhig de dag gi skyed mos tshal ci 'dra ba blta'o zhes de rnams glod nas de dag gi skyed mos tshal du zhugs so//
2a4('dul ba): de dag gis de na brtsal ba'i yo byad mda' bo che dang / drang ba dang / 'phang rdo sna tshogs dang / gar dang / glu dang / rol mo'i sgra'i cha byad sna tshogs dang / pi bang dang / gling bu dang / rdza rnga dang / khar rnga dang / skad snyan la sogs pa sna tshogs dang /
2a5('dul ba): khrus kyi yo byad so phag dang / bkru ba'i phye ma dang / mgo bkru ba skyu ru ra sna tshogs mthong ba dang / de rnams kyis phan tshun smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga' bo yo byad phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa du ma 'di dag yod na/ ci re zhig rtsal bya'am/ 'on
2a6('dul ba): te gar bya'am/ glu blang ngam/ rol mo'i sgra bya'am/ khrus bya/ kha cig gis smras pa/ bdag cag bkrus nas ring zhig lon gyis/ je khrus bya'o zhes de dag glod nas so phag dag gis drud cing drud nas khrus bya bar brtsams pa dang / bzo'i gnas
2b1('dul ba): dang / las kyi gnas de dag la mkhas pas khrus la zhugs pa de rnams kyi sgra yid du 'ong ba 'di lta ste/ sil snyan yan lag lnga pa skyes bu mkhas pas legs par dkrol ba'i lta bu byung ngo // skye bo'i tshogs phal po che lam de nas 'gro bas sgra de thos pa dang / de
2b2('dul ba): rnams rna byo ste/ yud tsam bsdad nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag yangs pa can gyi lits+tsha bI rnams kyi skyed mos tshal na gar mkhan rnams gar byed pa ltar 'dong ngam/ de ltar bya'o zhes ltad mo la yid 'dun pa de dag myur bar chas te skyed mos tshal du dong nas de dag nang du
2b3('dul ba): zhugs pa dang / drug sde rnams kyang phyir byung ngo // de dag gis de rnams la smras pa/ 'phags pa dag phyogs gang na gar mkhan rnams gar bgyid/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ bkren pa khyod kyis bye brag mi phyed de/ gar mkhan gar byed pa la sgra 'di lta bu
2b4('dul ba): 'byung ngam/ 'phags pa dag 'o na 'di su'i sgra lags/ shes ldan dag kho bo cag lus drud nas khrus byas pa yin no// 'phags pa dag ci dge sbyong khyed 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis gzir tam/ bkren pa khyed kyi mgrin pa rdog pas mnan la dge sbyong kho bo cag 'dod
2b5('dul ba): pa'i yon tan gyis gzir to/ / khyed kho bo cag gi rjes su ston pa yin nam ci/ ma smra bar deng / khyed la gnod pa byas sa re zhes de rnams kyis de dag bsdigs pa dang / spa gong nas dong ste/ yangs pa can du zhugs nas lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo
2b6('dul ba): dang / sum mdo dag tu 'phya bar brtsams so// dge slong rnams kyis skabs de thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams so phag dag gis lus drud de khrus byed pa
2b7('dul ba): las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis so phag gis lus drud de khrus mi bya'o// 'drud na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis so phag gis lus drud de khrus mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag rkang pa ser ga
3a1('dul ba): byung zhing dri ma dang bcas bzhin bsod snyoms la 'jug pa de dag bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed zhabs ser ga byung zhing dri ma dang bcas na/ ci ste dri ma sbyang bar mi bgyi/ de rnams kyis smras pa/
3a2('dul ba): bzhin dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // ci 'phags pa khyed dri ma'i 'dam bcangs pas dag par 'gyur ram/ de rnams cang mi smra bar 'dug ste/ bsod snyoms la brgyus nas gtsug lag khang du dong ba dang / skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom
3a3('dul ba): ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de ltar na snga ma ni bcas pa'o// 'di ni gnang ba yin te/ de lta bas na dge slong gis rkang pa so phag gis drud par gnang ngo // lus gzhan ni ma yin te/ 'drud na 'gal
3a4('dul ba): tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram khang pa brtsegs pa na bzhugs so// dge slong rnams snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/ lhung bzed thogs te yangs pa can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / de rnams
3a5('dul ba): kyis bram ze zhig sa dkar gyis sor ris gsum byugs nas slong mo la rgyu zhing de'i bslangs pa yang mang du rnyed par mthong ngo / / drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga' bo thabs 'di ni bzang po zhig ste/ bdag cag kyang de ltar bya'o zhes de rnams phyi de nyin sa
3a6('dul ba): dkar gyis sor ris gsum byugs nas bsod snyoms la zhugs pa ma dad pa rnams kyis mthong nas 'phya zhing gus par smra'o/ / gus par smra'o zhes smras pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ bkren pa khyed kyis gus par smra bar bya ba gang dag yin pa dang / phyag
3a7('dul ba): bya ba gang dag yin pa 'di yang mi shes sam/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'di la ci zhig 'tshal bar bgyi/ bram ze rgan pa rgan pa rnams ni gus par smra bar bya ba yin la/ dge slong rnams ni phyag bya ba yin na/ de ci'i phyir khyed dge slong rnams la gus par smra ba byed
3b1('dul ba): kyi phyag ma yin/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis khyed bram ze lags par 'tshal gyi dge slong du ni ma lags so// de lta lags pas bdag cag gis ma 'tshal gyis bzod par gsol lo zhes byas pa dang / de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go// skabs de dge slong rnams
3b2('dul ba): kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni dge slong rnams sor ris gsum 'dri ba las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis sor ris gsum bri bar mi bya'o// dge slong sor
3b3('dul ba): ris gsum 'dri na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis sor ris gsum mi byug go zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag sman pas bsgo yang lus sas mi skud pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to//
3b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de ltar na snga ma ni bcas pa'o// 'di ni gnang ba yin te/ de lta bas na sman pas bsgo ba ni ma gtogs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
3b5('dul ba): dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / drug sde rnams snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/ lhung bzed thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa na/ de rnams kyis bram ze gi'u wang gi thig le byas pa zhig skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyis bskor zhing ston mo'i
3b6('dul ba): bsngags pa brjod pa mthong ba dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga' bo thabs 'di ni bzang po zhig ste/ bdag cag kyang 'di ltar bya'o// legs kyis de ltar bya'o zhes de rnams phyi de nyin gi'u wang gi thig le dag gis bdag nyid brgyan pa byas nas bsod
3b7('dul ba): snyoms la zhugs pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis mthong nas 'phya zhing gus par smra'o gus par smra'o zhes smras pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ bkren pa khyod kyis gus par smra bar bya ba gang dag yin pa dang / phyag bya ba gang dag yin pa 'di yang
4a1('dul ba): mi shes sam/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'di la ci zhig 'tshal bar bgyi/ bram ze rgan pa rgan pa rnams ni gus par smra bar bya ba yin la/ dge slong rnams ni phyag bya ba yin na/ de ci'i phyir khyed dge slong rnams la gus par smra ba byed kyi phyag ma yin/
4a2('dul ba): 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis khyed bram ze lags par 'tshal gyi dge slong du ni ma lags so// de'i slad du bdag cag gis ma 'tshal gyis/ bzod par gsol lo zhes byas pa dang / de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
4a3('dul ba): la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni dge slong dag gi'u wang gi thig le dag gis bdag nyid brgyan pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis gi'u wang gi thig le dag gis brgyan par mi bya'o// brgyan
4a4('dul ba): na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gi'u wang gi thig le dag gis bdag nyid brgyan par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong zhig 'phral bar rma byung ba de sman pa'i drung du song nas bzhin bdag la sman ston cig/
4a5('dul ba): 'phags pa rma'i than kor gi'u wang gis skus shig dang khyod 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // 'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la
4a6('dul ba): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong dag sman pas bsgo ba ni ma gtogs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis so phag gis lus drud par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams nya phyis kyis 'drud
4a7('dul ba): par byed do/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nya phyis kyis drud par mi bya'o// 'drud na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// drug sde rnams
4b1('dul ba): dris byugs te gzhon nu rnams kyi nang du dong nas smras pa/ gzhon nu dag nged kyi dri ji lta snoms shig/ de dag gis smras pa/ gnas brtan ci khyed dris byugs sam/ byugs so// gnas brtan khyed dris byug tu rung ngam/ rung yang rung mi rung yang rung ste/ nged
4b2('dul ba): kyis ni byugs so/ / de dag 'phya smod kha zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dris nyug pa las gyur gyis de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis dris byug par
4b3('dul ba): mi bya'o/ / nyug na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis dris byug par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong nad pa zhig sman pa'i drung du song ste/ bzhin bdag la sman ston cig/ des smras pa/ 'phags
4b4('dul ba): pa dris byugs na khyod 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ / bzhin ci kho bo 'dod pa spyod dam/ 'phags pa khyod kyi sman ni 'di yin te/ gzhan gyis ni 'tsho bar mi nus so// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
4b5('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis sman pa'i lung gis dri bcang bar bya'o// dge slong dag dris byugs nas dge 'dun gyi nang na 'dug cing bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la chos ston par byed/ bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim rnams su
4b6('dul ba): yang 'gro bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas dge slong dri 'chang ba'i kun du spyad pa'i chos bca' bar bya ste/ dge slong dri 'chang bas dris byugs nas dge 'dun gyi nang du
4b7('dul ba): 'dug par mi bya/ bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la chos bstan par mi bya/ bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim rnams su 'gro bar mi bya'i/ nam sos par gyur pa de'i tshe khrus byas nas dri med par gyur pa dang dge 'dun gyi nang du 'dug par
5a1('dul ba): bya/ bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la chos bstan par bya/ bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim rnams su 'gro bar bya'o// dge slong dri 'chang bas kun du spyad pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te mi 'dug na
5a2('dul ba): 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro/ / bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag dge slong rnams la dri 'bul ba na/ dge slong rnams 'gyod nas mi len pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung bar ma gyur
5a3('dul ba): pa de'i tshe ni mu stegs can rnams yon gnas lags/ da ni bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung bas da ltar khyed yon gnas lags na/ gal te khyed kyis ma bzhes na ci bdag cag 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du dge ba'i lam rgyags ma mchis par mchi'am/
5a4('dul ba): bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bzhes shig/ de dag gis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blang bar bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis
5a5('dul ba): blangs nas de dag nyid kyi mdun du bor ba dang / de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis rin thang bzhin du nyo nyo na khyed kyis blangs te dor ram/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
5a6('dul ba): blangs nas dor bar mi bya'i/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la dri'i lag ris byug par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis blangs nas dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten dag la dri'i lag ris nyug go// de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa
5a7('dul ba): dag ci bdag cag gis mchod rten ma mthong ngam/ bdag cag gis ni khyed kho na la phul te/ dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten dag la ni sngar phul lags so// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
5b1('dul ba): blangs nas gnas khang la byug par bya'o// de rnams kyis gnas khang gi sgo la byugs pa dang / de dag dri gtsang khang yin no snyam nas phyag 'tshal bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
5b2('dul ba): pa/ nang du byug par bya'o// dge slong rnams kyis drang thad du byugs pa dang / nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngas dang nye ba 'am rkang pa dang nye bar byug par bya zhing dri zhim po thams cad mig la phan pas dus dus su bsnam
5b3('dul ba): par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri la 'jigs 'jigs lta'i tshal kyi nags na bzhugs so// ji tsam na rgyal bu gzhon nu rtogs byed kyi khang pad ma ris byed du bcug nas bcom
5b4('dul ba): ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gdugs tshod la spyan drangs te/ bcom ldan 'das khang pad ma'i ris su dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so// nye dga' bo zan za ba'i tshe lag pas ka ba la bsnun pa dang /
5b5('dul ba): khang pad ma ris g.yos par gyur to// 'dri mkhan rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rgyal bu rtogs byed kyis khang pad ma ris tshon brgya rtsa gcig gis bkra bar byas pa khyed kyis gzhig gam ci/ nye dga' bos smras pa/ bkren pa rtogs
5b6('dul ba): byed 'di la lhag par chags pas dus byas nas gar skye gtol med do/ / khyed kyang 'di la lhag par chags pas dus byas nas lba ba can rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro// de dag kha zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol
5b7('dul ba): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong dag ka ba la lag pas bsnun pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis lag pas ka ba la bsnun par mi bya'o// bsnun na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
6a1('dul ba): 'das kyis dge slong gis ka ba la lag pas bsnun par mi bya zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams khu tshur dang gru mo dang / phrag pa dang / mgo dang / rtsib logs dang / rgyab dang / rked pa dang / brla dang / pus mo dang / byin pa dang /
6a2('dul ba): rkang pa dang / dbyug pa dang / bong ba dang / gzhan gyis snun par byed pas nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gis kyang bsnun par mi bya'o// drug sde rnams rtsig pa dang sa dang / gzhan la snun par byed pa dang /
6a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhan la yang gang gis kyang bsnun par mi bya'o// bsnun na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//
6a4('dul ba): drug sde rnams snga dro mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / de rnams kyis bram ze zhig tshangs pa'i skud pa thogs te slong mo la rgyu zhing des bza' ba dang bca' ba yang mang du rnyed pa mthong nas drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga' bo thabs 'di ni
6a5('dul ba): bzang po zhig ste/ bdag cag kyang de lta bu bya'o zhes de dag phyi de nyin tshangs pa'i skud pa thogs te/ bsod snyoms la zhugs pa ma dad pa rnams kyis mthong nas/ 'phya zhing gus par smra'o// gus par smra'o zhes smras pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ bkren
6a6('dul ba): pa khyed kyis gus par smra bar bya ba gang dag yin pa dang / phyag bya ba gang dag yin pa 'di yang mi shes sam/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'di la ci zhig 'tshal bar bgyi/ bram ze rgan pa rgan pa rnams ni gus par smra bar bya ba yin la/ dge slong rnams ni phyag bya ba yin
6a7('dul ba): na/ de ci'i phyir khyed dge slong rnams la gus par smra bar byed kyi phyag ma yin/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis khyed bram ze lags par 'tshal gyi dge slong du ni ma lags so// de lta lags pas bdag cag gis ma 'tshal gyis bzod par gsol lo zhes byas pa dang /
6b1('dul ba): de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni dge slong rnams tshangs pa'i skud pa thogs pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas
6b2('dul ba): na dge slong gis tshangs pa'i skud pa gdags par mi bya'o/ / 'dogs na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// drug sde rnams snga dro sham
6b3('dul ba): thabs dang chos gos bgos/ lhung bzed thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa na/ de dag gis bram ze dri dang me tog gis brgyan pa tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas lag pa bcings pa zhig dus ston zos nas dbang po tshim ste/ khyim nas byung ba mthong
6b4('dul ba): ba dang / de dag gis smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga' bo thabs 'di ni bzang po zhig ste/ bdag cag kyang 'di bzhin bya'o zhes de dag phyi de nyin tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas lag pa bcings nas bsod snyoms la zhugs pa/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong
6b5('dul ba): nas 'phya zhing gus par smra'o/ / gus par smra'o zhes smras pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ bkren pa khyed kyis gus par smra bar bya ba gang dag yin pa dang / phyag bya ba gang dag yin pa 'di yang mi shes sam/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'di la ci zhig
6b6('dul ba): 'tshal bar bgyi/ bram ze rgan pa rgan pa rnams ni gus par smra bar bya ba yin la dge slong rnams ni phyag bya ba yin no// de ci'i phyir khyed dge slong rnams la gus par smra bar byed kyi phyag ma yin/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis khyed bram ze lags par 'tshal gyi/
6b7('dul ba): dge slong du ni ma lags so// de lta lags pas bdag cag gis ma 'tshal gyis bzod par gsol lo zhes byas pa dang / de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
7a1('dul ba): dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni dge slong rnams tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas lag pa 'ching ba las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas lag pa bcing bar mi bya'o// 'ching na 'gal tshabs can du
7a2('dul ba): 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas lag pa bcing bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong nad pa gzhan zhig sman pa'i drung du song ste/ bzhin kho bo la nad 'di lta bu byung na sman ston cig ces byas pa dang / des smras
7a3('dul ba): pa/ 'phags pa skud pa la gsang sngags dag gis bzlas brjod byas te/ lag pa la bcings na khyod 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ bzhin bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // 'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar
7a4('dul ba): 'gyur ro/ / skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis sman pa'i lung gis skud pa bcang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pa'i lung gis skud pa bcang bar bya'o zhes
7a5('dul ba): bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams lag pa g.yas pa'i rtse mo la 'ching ste/ nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag lag pa g.yas pa'i rtse mo la bcing bar mi bya'o// de rnams lag pa g.yas pa'i dpung pa
7a6('dul ba): la 'ching ste/ nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag pa g.yas pa'i dpung pa la bcing bar mi bya'o// de rnams lag pa g.yon pa'i rtse mo la 'ching ste/ nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
7a7('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/ lag pa g.yon pa'i rtse mo la bcing bar mi bya'i/ 'on kyang lag pa g.yon pa'i dpung pa la bcing bar bya'o// dge slong rnams nad sos par gyur nas skud pa bab bab tu 'dor bas mi ma yin pa rnams 'phya ste/ 'phags pa dag nged kyis sos
7b1('dul ba): par byas na da ma gus par byed pa lta/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bab bab tu dor bar mi bya ste/ gal te nad ma byang na chos gos kyi mtha'a'am/ rgya cang la bcing bar
7b2('dul ba): bya'o/ / 'on te thams cad kyi thams cad du sos par gyur na ka ba'i ser ga'am/ rtsig pa'i gseb tu gzhug par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// drug
7b3('dul ba): sde rnams snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/ lhung bzed thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa na/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis rgyan slo ma'i nang du bzhag pa drug sde rnams kyis rkang rgyan dang lag rgyan dag thogs nas smras pa/ dga'
7b4('dul ba): bo nye dga' bo ji lta mdzes sam/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa khyed mgo ni byi/ mchan khung ni spun na 'di la lus mdzes pa ci zhig yod gdon mi za bar dge sbyong khyed 'dod pa'i yon tan dag gis gzir bar gyur to zhes byas pa dang / de
7b5('dul ba): rnams cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ / skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams lag rgyan dang rkang rgyan dag gis bdag nyid brgyan pa las gyur gyis/
7b6('dul ba): de lta bas na dge slong gis lag rgyan dang rkang rgyan gyis bdag nyid brgyan par mi bya'o// brgyan na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// gtsug
7b7('dul ba): lag khang du ma byin par len pa rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi mdzod dang / gang zag gi gnas khang dag nas brkus so// dge slong gzhan dag gcig gi yang stor na/ bdag cag gi stor nas ji tsam lon pa ma tshor ro// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la
8a1('dul ba): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis rgya bcang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis rgya bcang bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUr+ya dang shel las byas
8a2('dul ba): pa dang / sor gdub rgya rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dag bcangs so// de nas bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis mthong nas lag pa brgyang ste smras pa/ bzhin nad med cig nad med cig/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa 'di ci lags/ bzhin
8a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis rgya gnang ngo de dag 'phya smod kha zer zhing dge sbyong shAkya'i bu rnams kyis dge sbyong gi tshul nyams shing tshangs pa'i tshul nyams te/ 'di na da ltar rgya la tha snyad 'dogs shing rgyan rnams kyis bdag nyid brgyan par byed do// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos
8a4('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUr+ya dang / shel las byas pa'i rgya bcang bar mi bya/ sor gdub rgya yang bcang bar mi bya'i 'on kyang rgya lnga po ra gan dang / zangs
8a5('dul ba): las byas pa dang / khar ba las byas pa dang / ba so las byas pa dang / rwa las byas pa bcang bar bya'o// drug sde rnams kyis rgya la skyes pa dang / bud med nyal po byed pa bris pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa ci dge sbyong khyod
8a6('dul ba): 'dod pa'i yon tan dag gis gzir tam/ gnas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgya ni gnyis te/ dge 'dun gyi dang gang zag gi'o// de la dge 'dun gyi ni dbus su 'khor lo bris la/
8a7('dul ba): glo gnyis su 'og tu gtsug lag khang gi bdag po'i ming bri bar bya'o// gang zag gi ni rus pa'i keng rus sam/ mgo'i thod pa bri bar bya'o// // sdom ni/ sen mo 'breg dang byi dor dang // a mra dang ni skyu ru ra// lhung bzed brgyad po bkag pa dang //
8b1('dul ba): rjes su gnang ba gnyis yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal
8b2('dul ba): phul ba de'i tshe/ des 'breg mkhan gyi mi la smras pa/ kye skyes bu rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song la 'phags pa rnams kyi skra dang kha spu bregs shig/ de rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang / drug sde rnams kyi kun du spyod pa ni drug sde gang yang rung ba zhig gis rgyal
8b3('dul ba): bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo mi stong pa yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na 'chag cing 'dug pa des de rgyang ring po nas mthong nas smras pa/ bzhin 'ongs pa legs so// 'ongs pa legs so// khyod zla ba lta bur gnas na ring mo zhig lon
8b4('dul ba): te/ gang nas 'ongs/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa khyim bdag gis 'phags pa rnams kyi skra dang kha spu breg pa'i slad du 'dir btang ngo // des smras pa/ sen mo legs par 'breg shes sam/ 'phags pa 'di nyid bdag gi bzo lags so// bltas tshur de
8b5('dul ba): nye bar 'ongs pa dang / nye dga' bos lag pa brkyang ngo // 'breg mkhan gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa ci 'dra bar breg/ bzhin 'bru'i rtse mo ltar bregs shig/ des 'bru'i rtse mo ltar bregs pa dang / des smras pa/ da ni ra ba'i cog lta bu dang / spu gri'i so
8b6('dul ba): dang / ste'u ka dang / zla ba tshes pa ltar gyis shig/ des de ji lta/ ji ltar sgo ba de lta bur byas pa dang / mjug tu smras pa/ bkren pa khyod ko cung zad kyang mi shes pa zhig/ 'di kho na ltar mnyam par gyis la song shig ces des de nyi ma nub kyi bar du ma btang ngo // de nyi
8b7('dul ba): ma nub nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi drung du song ba dang / mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ kye skyes bu khyod kyis 'phags pa mang po ji snyed cig gi mgo dang kha spu bregs/ bdag gis 'phags pa rnams kyi skra dang kha spu ga la bregs/ dge sbyong gzu lums can
9a1('dul ba): nye dga' bos bdag bsgor nas/ sen mo 'bru'i rtse mo dang / ra ba'i cog dang / spu gri'i so dang / ste'u ka dang / zla ba tshes pa lta bur gyis shig ces pa'i rnam pa thams cad bdag gis bgyis pa dang / de nas 'di skad ces/ bkren pa khyod ko cung zad
9a2('dul ba): kyang mi shes pa zhig/ 'di kho na ltar mnyam par gyis la song shig ces mchi nas da gzod kho na shor na ci zhig bgyi/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba rnams la nye bar zhi ba med pa lta zhes 'phya ba la zhugs so// skabs
9a3('dul ba): de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams sen mo 'breg pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis sen mo breg par mi bya'o// 'breg na 'gal tshabs
9a4('dul ba): can du 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis sen mo breg par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams sen mo ring po ring por 'dug pa bram ze dang khyim bdag de dag gis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dag ci ste sen mo ring po ring por 'jog/ bzhin
9a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / / 'phags pa ci khyod sen mo bcangs pas 'dag par 'gyur ram/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snga ma ni bcas pa'o// 'di ni gnang
9a6('dul ba): ba yin te de lta bas na gnang gis sen mo rnam pa gnyis po spu gri'i so dang / ste'u ka lta bur breg par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis
9a7('dul ba): sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zhes bya ba thams cad de kho na bzhin no/ / khyod sen mo 'chos shes sam/ 'phags pa ji lta bur bgyi/ ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / gser gyi kha dog lta bur gyis shig ces pa'i rnam pa thams cad bdag
9b1('dul ba): gis bgyis pa dang / de nas 'di skad ces bkren pa khyed ko cung zad kyang mi shes pa zhig/ 'di kho na ltar mnyam par gyis la song shig ces mchi nas da gzod kho na shor na ci zhig bgyi/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu
9b2('dul ba): byung ba rnams la nye bar zhi ba med pa lta zhes 'phya ba la zhugs so/ / skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams sen mo dag byi dor byed pa las
9b3('dul ba): gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis sen mo dag byi dor mi bya'o// byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis sen mo dag byi dor mi bya'o// zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong tshon rtsi'i las dang / lhung bzed kyi las byed
9b4('dul ba): pa rnams kyi sen mo dri ma chags la mdog mi sdug par gyur cing / de rnams sen mo de 'dra ba kho nar bsod snyoms la 'jug go// bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed ci'i phyir sen mo de lta bur dri ma chags shing mdog mi sdug/
9b5('dul ba): de dag gis bsnyad pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa ci'i phyir dri ma mi dbyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // 'phags pa khyed ci dri ma'i 'dam bcangs pas 'dag par 'gyur ram/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol
9b6('dul ba): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dri ma dbyi ba'i phyir sen mo bzhar bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so// rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i kun du spyod pa ni dus kyi
9b7('dul ba): gsar thog 'bru sar pa'am 'bras bu sar pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag dang por dge 'dun la 'bul lo/ / de'i 'og tu bdag nyid za'o// de'i blon po rnams kyis a mra'i shing thog dag phul ba dang / des smras pa/ song la 'phags pa rnams la phul cig/ de
10a1('dul ba): dag gis bgad pa dang / des smras pa/ shes ldan dag ci la dgod/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha ci khyod da ni 'phags pa rnams la dang por 'bul snyam dgongs kyi/ bdag cag gis ches sngar 'phags pa rnams la phul bar ni ma lags sam/
10a2('dul ba): des smras pa/ gal te de lta na ngas 'phags pa rnams la stong gi kun dga' ra ba nyid phul lo// lha legs te rjes su yi rang ngo // des phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir stong gi kun dga' ra ba phul nas der dus ston kyang btsugs so// de ji ltar
10a3('dul ba): yul ma ga d+hA na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dus ston la lta bar 'ongs pa a mra'i shing thog smin pa rnams kyis tshim par gyur pa de ltar shing thog rgyas par gyur to/ / de dge 'dun la phul zhes dge slong rnams kyis a mra'i 'bras bu dag ma smin pa nyid du zos so// ji tsam na
10a4('dul ba): mtshams kyi rgyal po zhig la a mra dag dgos par gyur nas/ des rgyal po gzugs can snying po la pho nya btang ste/ grogs po bdag la a mra dag dgos kyis bskur ba'i rigs so zhes byas pa dang / des pho nya de la smras pa/ kye skyes bu ngas stong gi kun dga' ra ba de
10a5('dul ba): 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la phul gyis song la 'phags pa'i dge 'dun rnams la slongs shig/ de 'od ma'i tshal du song ba dang / drug sde rnams kyis kun tu spyod pa ni rtag tu kun dga' ra ba'i sgo mi stong par byed pa yin/ tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo 'od ma'i tshal gyi sgo na
10a6('dul ba): 'chag cing 'dug go/ / de de'i drung du song nas phyag 'tshal te des smras pa/ rgyal po che ge mo zhig gis a mra'i ched du khyed kyi thad du btang na de'i slad du a mra dag stsal ba'i rigs so// des smras pa/ kye skyes bu song la a mra ji tsam dgos pa de tsam long shig/ de song nas
10a7('dul ba): a mra'i shing rnams kyi drung du bltas na mi snang ste/ de slar log nas smras pa/ 'phags pa ma mchis so// nye dga' bos de khrid nas kun dga' ra bar zhugs te/ kun dga'i ra ba thams cad bskor nas smras pa/ kye skyes bu shing 'di la 'dzegs shig/ des
10b1('dul ba): 'dzegs nas ma mthong ba dang / nye dga' bos smras pa/ kye skyes bu dag shar gyi yal gar song lho dang nub kyi yal gar song / de thams cad du song nas skyo bar gyur te babs nas smras pa/ 'phags pa ci kun dga'i ra ba 'di lo 'di la 'bras bu ma chags sam/ bzhin
10b2('dul ba): ji ltar lo re zhing lo re zhing shing thog yod pa de ltar 'di 'bras bu chags so/ / 'phags pa ci rlung dang char pas blags sam/ bzhin rlung dang char pas ma blags kyi/ 'on kyang kho bo cag gis a mra'i 'bras bu dag ma smin pa nyid du 'chos so// de slar
10b3('dul ba): log nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po la gsol pa/ lha 'phags pa rnams kyi zhal nas kho bo cag gis a mra'i 'bras bu dag ma smin pa nyid du 'chos so zhes gsung ngo // des smras pa/ legs te nga la longs spyad pa nyid dgos so zhes byas pa dang / mi de slar song
10b4('dul ba): ngo / / ji tsam na dus ston la bab pa'i tshe yul ma ga d+hA na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'dus nas/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag ci stong gi kun dga' ra ba 'di lo 'di la 'bras bu ma chags sam/ bzhin dag ji ltar lo re lo re zhing shing thog yod pa
10b5('dul ba): de ltar 'di 'bras bu chags mod kyi/ 'on kyang kho bo cag gis a mra'i 'bras bu dag ma smin pa nyid du 'chos so// 'phags pa dag gang yul ma ga d+hA na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad a mra smin pa dag gis tshim par 'gyur ba de khyed kyis 'bras bu ma smin pa kho nar 'chos
10b6('dul ba): te/ gang kho bo cag la gnod pa byas pa ni ma legs pa zhig byas so// des smras pa/ 'di rgyal pos yul ma ga d+hA na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la byin pa ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul te/ de lta bas na kho bo cag gis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin
10b7('dul ba): zos so/ / khyed ci gtogs zhes byas pa dang / de dag 'phya smod kha zer bar byed do// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni dge slong rnams a mra dag
11a1('dul ba): za ba las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis a mra dag bza' bar mi bya'o// dge slong a mra dag za na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis a mra dag bza' bar mi bya'o// zhes gsungs pa dang / bram ze
11a2('dul ba): dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag dge slong rnams la shing sa ha ka ra'i shing tog dag 'bul ba na/ dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung bar
11a3('dul ba): ma gyur pa zhes bya ba nas/ 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du 'gro'am/ bzhes shig ces bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang
11a4('dul ba): gis mtshan nyid grub pa yin no zhes byas nas bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// de la mtshan nyid grub pa ni 'di dag yin te/ tshig gu chags pa rnams so// bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can gzhan dag cig/ dge slong rnams la a mra'i shing thog smin
11a5('dul ba): pa dag 'bul ba na zhes bya ba nas/ de bzhin du 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du mchi'am/ bzhes shig ces bya ba'i bar thams cad snga ma bzhin no// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
11a6('dul ba): de lta bas na gnang gis mtshan nyid bye brag phyed do zhes byas te bza' bar bya'o// de la mtshan nyid bye brag phyed pa ni 'di dag yin te/ sha zhugs pa rnams so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba
11a7('dul ba): na bzhugs so/ / mnyan yod na dge slong nad pa zhig sman pa'i drung du song ste/ bzhin bdag 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis thebs na sman ston cig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa je mar 'thung la snum par gyis shig dang bkru sman sbyin no// des mar 'thungs
11b1('dul ba): pa dang / skom pas gnod par gyur to// sman pa 'ongs te dris pa/ 'phags pa bde bar 'dug gam/ des smras pa/ bzhin bdag skom pas gnod do// skyu ru ra chongs shig ces byas pa dang / des lag tu blangs te 'dug go// yang sman pas dris
11b2('dul ba): pa/ 'phags pa skom pa dang bral lam/ des smras pa/ bzhin ma bral lo// sman pas smras pa/ 'phags pa de'i tshe skyu ru ra ma bcangs sam/ bzhin yod de 'di yin no// 'phags pa khar chongs shing // bzhin bcom ldan
11b3('dul ba): 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / / 'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro// skabs de zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khar bcang bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// des khar bcug nas 'dug go// yang sman
11b4('dul ba): pa de 'ongs nas dris pa/ 'phags pa skom pa dang bral lam/ des smras pa/ bzhin da rung ma bral lo// sman pas smras pa/ 'phags pa de'i tshe skyu ru ra khar ma bcangs sam/ bzhin bcangs te 'dug pa 'di yin no// des smras pa/
11b5('dul ba): 'phags pa mur cig/ gzhan du na skom pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // 'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das
11b6('dul ba): la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mur bar bya'o// mur mur nas bor gyi ma mid pa dang / skom pas je gnod par gyur to// yang sman pa 'ongs nas dris pa/ 'phags pa skom pa dang bral lam/ des smras pa/ bzhin shin
11b7('dul ba): tu gnod do/ / 'phags pa de'i tshe skyu ru ra ma mur ram/ bzhin mur nas bor ro// 'phags pa ci'i phyir ma mid/ bzhin bcom ldan 'das kyis dus ma yin pa'i zas bkag go// 'phags pa khyod ni nad pa yin la/ khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje
12a1('dul ba): can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro/ / skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong dag gnang gis 'bras bu lnga dus su yang rung / dus ma yin par yang rung /
12a2('dul ba): nad pa yang rung / mi na bas kyang rung bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bras bu lnga dus su yang rung / dus ma yin par yang rung / nad pa yang rung / mi na bas kyang rung ste/ bza' bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / dge
12a3('dul ba): slong rnams kyis 'bras bu lnga gang dag yin pa mi shes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyu ru ra dang / a ru ra dang / ba ru ra dang / pi pi ling dang / na le sham mo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da
12a4('dul ba): ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/ / rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na khyim bdag shin tu bzang po zhes bya ba phyug cing nor mang ba longs spyod chen po zhig gnas pa de gcer bu pa rnams la rab tu dad do// des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed
12a5('dul ba): dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// de rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las dus gzhan zhig na chung ma la sems can zhugs par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyang snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos mnabs lhung bzed bsnams te rgyal po'i
12a6('dul ba): khab tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs nas rgyal po'i khab na bsod snyoms la rgyu zhing khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i khyim ga la ba de logs su gshegs pa dang / khyim bdag shin tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das rgyang ma nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang chung ma khrid nas bcom ldan
12a7('dul ba): 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gi mchis 'brang 'di sems can zhugs par gyur na ci zhig tu btsa' bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bu phor btsa' bar 'gyur zhing / rigs
12b1('dul ba): gsal bar byed par 'gyur/ lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro// des bcom ldan 'das la bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas lhung
12b2('dul ba): bzed bkang ste phul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis nad med cig ces gsungs nas bsod snyoms bzhes te gshegs so// de dang ha cang mi ring ba zhig na gcer bu pa zhig 'dug pa des bsams pa/ gang bdag cag la bslang ba'i khyim gcig pu zhig yod pa de yang dge
12b3('dul ba): sbyong gau ta mas kha drangs kyis song la dge sbyong gau ta mas ci lung bstan pa blta'o snyam mo/ / de der song ste smras pa/ khyim bdag dge sbyong gau ta ma 'ongs par gyur tam/ byon to// des ci zhig lung bstan/ 'phags pa bdag gis de la chung ma bstan te/ ci zhig tu
12b4('dul ba): btsa' bar 'gyur zhes bgyis pa dang / de bu phor btsa' bar 'gyur zhing / rigs gsal bar byed par 'gyur/ lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du
12b5('dul ba): byed par 'gyur ro zhes gsung ngo / / gcer bu pa de rtsis mkhas pa zhig ste/ rdo rgyus kha dog dkar po blangs nas brtsis pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du lung bstan pa de thams cad de kho na bzhin du mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ gal te rjes su bsngags na
12b6('dul ba): ni khyim bdag 'di dge sbyong gau ta ma la je dad par 'ong bas de bas na 'dir cung zad cig ni bsngags par bya/ cung zad cig ni smad par bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ lag pa kyog bzhin bsgyur ba dang / khyim bdag shin tu bzang pos smras pa/ 'phags pa ci ste lag pa kyog bzhin
12b7('dul ba): bsgyur/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag 'di la cung zad cig ni bden/ cung zad cig ni no// 'phags pa gang ni bden gang ni / khyim bdag bu phor btsa' bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ba gang yin pa de ni bden no// rigs gsal bar byed par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba
13a1('dul ba): gang yin pa de ni bden na/ gsal ba ni me'i ming yin pas sems can skal ba chung ngu de btsas ma thag kho nar khyim mes tshig par 'gyur ro// lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// zhes zer ba gang yin pa de ni te/ khyim bdag
13a2('dul ba): khyod kyis mir gyur pa la lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar gyur pa 'ga' yod pa lta mthong ngam/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo zhes zer ba de bden te/ gang gi tshe 'di bza' ba yang med/ bgo ba yang med pa de'i tshe gdon mi za bar dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thad du rab tu
13a3('dul ba): byung bar 'gyur ro/ / nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba gang yin pa de ni te/ re zhig dge sbyong gau ta ma la yang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i dgra bcom pa nyid med na/ de'i nyan thos la lta smos kyang
13a4('dul ba): ci dgos/ khyim bdag shin tu bzang po mi dga' bar gyur nas smras pa/ 'phags pa 'di la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ gcer bu pas smras pa/ khyim bdag bdag cag ni rab tu byung ba ste/ bslab pa blangs pa yin pas khyod nyid shes so zhes smras nas song ngo //
13a5('dul ba): shin tu bzang pos bsams pa 'di yang dor ro snyam nas sman ma yin pa sbyin par brtsams pa dang / sems can de srid pa tha ma pa zhig pas sman ma yin pa de yang de la sman du gyur to// des de'i dku g.yon pa mnye bar brtsams pa dang / mngal na 'dug pa de dku g.yas
13a6('dul ba): par song ngo / / shin tu bzang pos dku g.yas pa mnye bar brtsams pa dang / de dku g.yon par song ste/ srid pa tha ma pa'i sems can zag pa zad pa ma thob kyi bar du bar ma dor rgyun chad cing dus byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med do// khyim
13a7('dul ba): bdag shin tu bzang po'i chung ma de dku mnyes pas ngu bar brtsams pa dang / khyim tshes dag gis thos nas rings pa rings par song ste dris pa/ shes ldan khyim bdag gi chung ma 'di ci ste ngu / shin tu bzang pos smras pa/ gdon mi za bar 'di bu btsa' ba'i dus la bab po
13b1('dul ba): zhes byas pa dang / de de dag dong ngo // shin tu bzang pos bsams pa/ bdag gis 'di 'dir gsad mi nus kyis/ dgon par bkri'o snyam nas/ des de dgon par khrid nas ci nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar brtsal nas des de sbas te khyim du khyer nas
13b2('dul ba): mdza' bo dang / nye du dang / phu nu dang / khyim tshes rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag kho bo'i chung ma shi'o// de dag gis ngu bar brtsams nas de dag ngu zhing de gos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams kyis khyogs brgyan nas bsil ba tshal
13b3('dul ba): gyi dur khrod du khyer ro/ / gcer bu pa dag gis thos nas de dag dga' mgu rangs nas gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag bsgreng ste rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer gyi lam po che dang / srang dang bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dag tu rgyu zhing smras pa/ shes ldan dag nyon cig/
13b4('dul ba): dge sbyong gau ta mas khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i chung ma bu phor btsa' bar 'gyur zhing / rigs gsal bar byed par 'gyur/ lha dang mi'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du
13b5('dul ba): byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de ni shi nas bsil ba tshal gyi dur khrod du khyer ro/ / re zhig shing gang la rtsa ba nyid kyang med pa de la yal ga dang 'dab ma dang / lo ma 'byung bar lta ga la 'gyur/ skabs 'di lta bu la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mi mkhyen pa 'am/
13b6('dul ba): mi gzigs pa 'am/ mi rig pa 'am/ rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po 'jig rten la phan par zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pu/ gcig tu dpa' ba/ zla med pa gnyis su mi gsung ba/ zhi gnas
13b7('dul ba): dang lhag mthong gis gnas pa/ bslab pa gsum la legs par bslabs pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo bzhi las rgal ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil la legs par gnas pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po
14a1('dul ba): nas goms par mdzad pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi snyengs pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par spangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa/ drug la rtag tu gnas pa/ byang
14a2('dul ba): chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/ lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' ba/ grags pas phyogs bcur khyab pa/ stong la dbang sgyur ba bas khyad par du
14a3('dul ba): 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs shing su ni nyams/ su ni dar/ su ni nyam nga bar gyur/ su ni skobs su chud par gyur/ su ni gnod par gyur/ su ni nyam nga ba dang / skobs
14a4('dul ba): su chud pa dang / gnod par gyur/ su ni ngan song la gzhol/ su ni ngan song la bab/ su ni ngan song la 'bab/ gang ni ngan song las drangs nas mtho ris dang / thar pa dang / 'bras bu la dgod/ gang zhig gis dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa ni bskyed par bya/ gang
14a5('dul ba): zhig gis bskyed pa ni yongs su smin par bya/ gang zhig smin pa ni grol bar bya zhes ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go// yang smras pa/ chu srin gnas kyi rgya mtsho ni// dus rlabs 'da' bar 'gyur srid kyi// gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la// sangs rgyas dus las
14a6('dul ba): mi 'da'o/ / ji ltar ma ni sdug pa'i bu gcig la// lta zhing de yi srog kyang srung ba ltar// de bzhin gshegs pa gdul ba'i skye bo la// de bzhin gzigs shing de yi rgyud kyang srung // thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyu la gnas pa yi// thugs rje'i ba drus ba gshin be'u stor
14a7('dul ba): bzhin/ / srid pa bgrod dkar 'khyams par gyur pa yi// gdul ba'i sras rnams skyo mi mkhyen par tshol// // 'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi/ bam po gnyis pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs zhig tu 'dzum pa mdzad do// chos nyid kyis gang gi
14b1('dul ba): tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dag byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro/ kha cig ni steng du 'gro ste/ gang dag 'og tu 'gro ba de dag ni dmyal ba yang sos dang / thig nag
14b2('dul ba): dang / bsdus gzhom dang / ngu 'bod dang / ngu 'bod chen po dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol ba dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer ba dang / a cu zer ba dang / ut+pal ltar gas pa dang / pad ma ltar
14b3('dul ba): gas pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa chen por song ste/ tsha ba'i dmyal ba gang dag yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur nas 'bab/ grang ba'i dmyal ba gang dag yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur nas 'bab po// des sems can de rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi khyad par rgyun bcad pa dang /
14b4('dul ba): de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dag ci bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam/ 'on te gzhan du skyes zhes zer ro// de dag dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das sprul pa gtong ste/ de dag gis sprul pa de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems shing shes ldan dag
14b5('dul ba): bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos pa yang ma yin gzhan du skyes pa yang ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang sems can 'di sngon ma mthong ba zhig ste/ 'di'i mthus bdag cag sdug bsngal gyi khyad par rgyun chad do zhes zer ro// de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dang bas dmyal ba
14b6('dul ba): myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad par byas nas gang du sems can rnams snod du gyur pa lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyor ba 'dzin to/ / gang dag steng du 'gro ba de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i lha dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan
14b7('dul ba): dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs chen dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang /
15a1('dul ba): bsod nams 'phel dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du song nas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa zhes bya
15a2('dul ba): ba yang sgrogs so/ / tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyang sgrogs te/ brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya// sangs rgyas bstan la 'bad par bya// 'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin// 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya// chos 'dul 'di la gang zhig ni// bag
15a3('dul ba): dang bcas par spyod byed pa/ / skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas// sdug bsngal gyi ni mthar byed 'gyur// de nas 'od zer de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi phyi bzhin phyi bzhin 'brang zhing 'gro ste/ de gal
15a4('dul ba): te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su nub par 'gyur ro/ / ma 'ongs pa lung ston par bzhed na ni mdun du nub par 'gyur ro// dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur ro//
15a5('dul ba): dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni long bur nub par 'gyur ro// su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthe bor nub par 'gyur ro// mir skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni pus mor nub par 'gyur ro// stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal
15a6('dul ba): srid lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon gyi mthil du nub par 'gyur ro/ / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur ro// lhar skye ba lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar nub par 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi byang chub lung
15a7('dul ba): ston par bzhed na ni zhal du nub par 'gyur ro/ / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni mdzod spur nub par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni gtsug tor du nub par 'gyur ro// de nas 'od zer de dag gis
15b1('dul ba): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du nub po// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs tshon ni stong dag
15b2('dul ba): gis/ / bkra ba'i tshogs dag zhal gyi nang nas byung // nyi ma shar bar gyur pa ji lta bar// de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis// tshigs su bcad de yang gsol pa/ sangs rgyas rgod bral zhum dang rgyags pa spangs// rgyal ba dgra thul 'gro mchog rgyur
15b3('dul ba): gyur pa/ / rgyu ma mchis par pad ma'i rtsa lag dang // dung ltar dkar ba'i 'dzum pa ston mi mdzad// de ltas nyid kyi brtan blos dus mkhyen nas// rgyal dbang nyan po nyan par 'tshal rnams kyi// the tshom skyes pa thub pa skyes mchog gi// gsung mchog bzang
15b4('dul ba): zhing brtan pas bsal du gsol/ / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab ltar brtan pa// zung thub rnams ni glo bur 'dzum mi ston// mgon po ci slad 'dzum pa mdzad pa de// skye bo'i tshogs 'di nyan par yang dag 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
15b5('dul ba): kun dga' bo de de bzhin no de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad do// kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dur khrod du rgyu zhing
15b6('dul ba): gshegs par bzhed kyis khyed las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig dur khrod du rgyu zhing 'gro bar spro ba de chos gos dag so so nas long shig ces bsgo shig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/
15b7('dul ba): dge slong dag gang na ba der song ste phyin nas dge slong rnams la dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dur khrod du rgyu zhing gshegs par bzhed kyis/ khyed las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig dur khrod du rgyu zhing 'gro bar spro ba de chos gos dag so so nas long shig
16a1('dul ba): ces bsgo ba dang / dge slong thams cad 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba zhi ba 'khor zhi ba grol ba 'khor grol ba/ dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa/ rnam par dul ba 'khor
16a2('dul ba): rnam par dul ba/ dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba/ mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa/ khyu mchog ba glang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ glang po che glang po che'i phru gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ seng ge mche ba
16a3('dul ba): can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nam mkha' lding bya'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ bram ze bram ze'i khye'u'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ sman pa nad pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ dpa' bo dmag mi'i
16a4('dul ba): tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ sa mkhan 'gron pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ded dpon tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ tshong dpon 'khor gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ khams kyi rgyal po blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'khor los sgyur ba bu stong
16a5('dul ba): gis bskor ba lta bu/ zla ba skar ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nyi ma 'od zer stong gis bskor ba lta bu/ yul 'khor srung dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ 'phags skyes po grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis bskor
16a6('dul ba): ba lta bu/ rnam thos sras gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ thags zangs ris lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ brgya byin sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ tshangs pa tshangs ris pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rgya mtsho mi
16a7('dul ba): g.yo ba lta bu/ sprin chu dang bcas pa lta bu/ glang po che'i rgyal po dregs pa med pa lta bu/ dbang po shin tu dul bas spyod lam mi nyams par gshegs pa/ sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par
16b1('dul ba): byas pa/ sku 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ 'od nyi ma stong bas lhag pa/ rin po che'i ri 'gro ba lta bur kun nas bzang ba/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ nyan
16b2('dul ba): thos chen po kun shes kauN+Di n+ya dang / rta thul dang / rlangs pa dang / ming chen dang / bzang po dang / shA ri'i bu dang / maud gal gyi bu dang / 'od srung dang / grags pa dang / gang po la sogs pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun mang po gzhan dang / srog chags brgya
16b3('dul ba): stong phal mo ches bskor nas bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du gshegs so/ / sangs rgyas gshegs pa la phan yon brgyad yod de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ me'i 'jigs pa med/ chu'i 'jigs pa med/ seng ge'i 'jigs pa med/ stag gi 'jigs pa
16b4('dul ba): med/ gzig gi 'jigs pa med/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa med/ rkun po'i 'jigs pa med/ la gcan pa'i 'jigs pa med/ gru btsas kyi 'jigs pa med/ sho gam gyi 'jigs pa med/ bsel rngan gyi 'jigs pa med/ mi'i 'jigs
16b5('dul ba): pa med/ mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa med/ dus dus su gzugs bzang po dag mthong bar 'gyur/ sgra snyan pa dag thos par 'gyur/ 'od chen po dag mthong bar 'gyur/ kun shes pa lung ston pa dag thos par 'gyur/ chos kyi longs spyod dang / zang zing gi
16b6('dul ba): longs spyod dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas gshegs pa ni gnod pa chung ba yin pas lha dang / mi brgya stong du ma bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring du phyi bzhin 'brang ngo // bsil ba'i tshal logs nas rlung dag kyang langs so// rgyal rigs kyi khye'u zhig
16b7('dul ba): dang / bram ze'i khye'u byis pa gnyis shig rgyal po'i khab nas phyi rol du byung ste rtse zhing 'khod do// de gnyis las rgyal rigs kyi khye'u ni dad pa dang ldan pa yin/ bram ze'i khye'u ni de lta ma yin no// bram ze'i khye'u des rgyal rigs kyi khye'u la smras pa/ grogs po
17a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i chung ma'i bu khye'ur skye bar 'gyur te/ rigs 'bar bar 'gyur zhing lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar 'gyur nas nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa
17a2('dul ba): nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de ni 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du khyer na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ du ma gyur grang / rgyal rigs kyi khye'u des tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ zla ba skar ma'i
17a3('dul ba): tshogs bcas sa la lhung yang srid/ / sa 'di ri dang nags bcas mkha' la 'gro yang srid// rgya mtsho chen po'i chu ni skam par 'gyur srid kyi// drang srong chen po gsung 'gyur ba srid pa min// bram ze'i khye'u des grogs po de ltar na bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod lta
17a4('dul ba): zhing 'dong ngo zhes smras nas de gnyis dong ba dang bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab nas gshegs pa mthong ngo / / rgyal rigs kyi khye'us bcom ldan 'das thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas yang tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ thub pa the tshom bral zhing rgod pa mi mnga' ba// ri
17a5('dul ba): dgas rgyal po lta bu'i sgra skad mchog sgrogs shing / / the tshom med par pha rol smra bas mi rdzi ba// 'di ltar skye bo'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing gshegs// bsil tshal phyogs su kha ba'i tshogs lta bu'i// bsil ba'i ngad can rlung ni langs par gyur pa ni//
17a6('dul ba): shAkya thub pa'i rdzu 'phrul brtag pa'i don gyi phyir// lha tshogs mang po gnas nas 'ongs pa nyid du nges// rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i chung ma'i bu khye'ur skye bar 'gyur te/ rigs 'bar bar 'gyur zhing lha dang
17a7('dul ba): mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur nas nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan na de ni 'chi ba'i dus la bab nas bsil tshal gyi dur khrod du phyung zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyang nyan
17b1('dul ba): thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du gshegs so zhes thos so/ / thos nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das ni don med par bsil tshal gyi dur khrod du mi gshegs pas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i
17b2('dul ba): chung ma la brten te gdul ba'i don chen po zhig mdzad par 'gyur gor ma chag gis ltar 'gro'o snyam nas de btsun mo dang / gzhon nu dang / blon po dang / pho brang 'khor ba dang / ljongs kyi mis yongs su bskor nas rgyal po'i khab nas song ba dang / rgyal rigs kyi khye'u des
17b3('dul ba): rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas yang tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ ma ga d+hA yi mnga' bdag rgyal po'i gtso bo 'di// 'di ltar 'khor bcas rgyal po'i khab nas byung ba las// skye bo'i tshogs kyi 'byor pa phun sum tshogs par ni//
17b4('dul ba): bdag gi snying la nges pa'i blo dag skyes par gyur// skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das mthong nas gshegs shul phye ba dang / bcom ldan 'das zhal 'dzum pa mdzad cing skye bo rnams kyi gung la bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das zhal 'dzum pa mdzad pa gcer bu pa
17b5('dul ba): dag gis mthong nas bsams pa/ 'di ltar dge sbyong gau ta ma bzhin 'dzum pa byed cing skye bo mang po'i gung la 'dug pa las na sems can 'di ma shi bar nges so snyam nas/ des khyim bdag shin tu bzang po la smras pa/ khyim bdag sems can skal ba chung ngu 'di ni ma
17b6('dul ba): shi'o/ / des smras pa/ 'phags pa de ltar gyur na skabs 'di la da ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag kho bo ni bslab pa'i gzhi yang dag par blangs pa yin gyis/ khyod nyid shes par gyis shig/ des bud shing bcer te chung ma'i ro me'i phung
17b7('dul ba): po'i nang du bcug ste bsregs pa dang / de'i lus thams cad tshig na lto'i nyen kor de bzhin du 'dug go// de nas lto'i nyen kor de rdol nas pad ma byung ste/ pad ma de'i snying po las gzhon nu gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa zhig byung ngo // de srog
18a1('dul ba): chags brgya stong dag gis mthong nas mchog tu ngo mtshar chen po skyes par gyur pa dang gcer bu pa dag gi rgyags pa dang / nga rgyal dang / khengs pa dag nyams so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag shin tu bzang po la bka' stsal pa/ khyim
18a2('dul ba): bdag gzhon nu long shig/ des gcer bu pa'i gdong du bltas pa dang / des smras pa/ khyim bdag me phung rab tu 'bar ba'i nang du zhugs na thams cad kyi thams cad du tshig par mi 'gyur ram/ de skad smras pas des ma blangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
18a3('dul ba): 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsos la bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed gzhon nu long shig/ des bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas ma yin skabs ma yin par bdag mi bskos kyis blang ngo snyam nas de the tshom med par me phung gi nang du zhugs te blangs so// rgyal ba'i
18a4('dul ba): bka' yis me yi phung por zhugs gyur te/ / de yis gzhon nu me yi nang nas blangs pa na// rgyal ba'i mthu yis me ni zhi ba nyid gyur cing // kha ba'i tshogs ltar bsil ba'ang skad cig de la byung // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'tsho byed gzhon nu la bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho
18a5('dul ba): byed khyod nyams pa'am/ gnod pa dag tu ma gyur tam/ des gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag rgyal po'i pho brang du btsas zhing rgyal po'i pho brang du skyes par gyur kyang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis zhugs kyi phung po tsan dan sa mchog lta bur bsil bar gyur pa
18a6('dul ba): 'di lta bu ni sngon chad ma myong lags so/ / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag shin tu bzang po la bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag gzhon nu 'di long shig/ de log par blta ba la phyogs pas re zhig len par mi byed cing / gcer bu pa de nyid kyi gdong du lta bar
18a7('dul ba): byed do/ / des smras pa/ khyim bdag mang du smra ci dgos/ mes ni thams cad 'tshig pa yin na/ gzhon nu shin tu skal ba chung ba 'di ma tshig pa las na/ 'di khyod kyi khyim du khyer na khyod kyi khyim yang tshig cing khyod kyi srog gi bar chad du yang 'gyur bar nges so// des
18b1('dul ba): bdag las gces pa med do snyam nas de ma blangs pa dang / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po gzhon nu long shig/ des gus par bsgrims pa dang bcas pas lag pa brkyang ste/ de
18b2('dul ba): blangs nas kun du brtags te gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khye'u 'di 'di ltar me'i nang nas skyes pas de'i phyir khye'u 'di'i ming me skyes zhes bya bar gdags so// de nas
18b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo phal po che'i tshogs de dag gi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas ci nas kyang sems can brgya phrag mang po de dag gis thos nas khyad par rnyed par 'gyur ba de lta bur chos bstan pa mdzad pas kha
18b4('dul ba): cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas
18b5('dul ba): par gyur to/ / kha cig gis ni dro bar gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / kha cig gis ni rtse mo dang / kha cig gis ni bzod pa chung ngu dang 'bring bskyed par gyur to// kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub dang / kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / kha cig
18b6('dul ba): gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed par gyur to/ / kha cig gis ni skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi dag yang dag par blangs te 'khor de dag las phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang / chos la 'bab pa dang / dge
18b7('dul ba): 'dun la bab par gyur to/ / de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos khye'u me skyes ma ma brgyad po pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtsen grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la rjes su gtad do// de ma ma
19a1('dul ba): brgyad po dag gis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed skyed par byed cing / rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin du myur du skyed par byed do// de'i
19a2('dul ba): zhang po zong thogs te yul gzhan du song ba des ji ltar bdag gi sring mo la sems can zhugs par gyur pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'ur skye bar 'gyur te/ rigs 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur nas/ nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon
19a3('dul ba): mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa thos nas des zong bsgyur te rin blangs nas rgyal po'i khab tu song ba dang / des 'di ltar bdag gi sring mo de 'chi ba'i dus la bab po zhes thos so// thos nas kyang
19a4('dul ba): bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bu khye'ur skye bar 'gyur te/ rigs 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur nas nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro// zhes
19a5('dul ba): lung bstan na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de du ma gyur tam snyam nas des khyim tshes dag la dris pa/ bdag gi sring mo la sems can zhugs par gyur pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'ur 'gyur te/ rigs 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / lha dang mi'i
19a6('dul ba): dpal yang myong bar gyur nas nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan par thos so// thos nas bdag kun tu dga' ba las de yang 'chi ba'i dus la bab po zhes thos
19a7('dul ba): na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de du ma gyur tam/ de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ zla ba skar ma'i tshogs bcas sa la lhung yang srid// sa 'di ri dang nags bcas mkha' la 'gro yang srid// rgya mtsho chen po'i chu ni skam par 'gyur
19b1('dul ba): srid kyi/ / drang srong chen po gsung 'gyur ba srid pa min// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ni du mi 'gyur te 'di ltar khyim thab des de ji lta ji ltar 'chi bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byas pas 'chi ba'i dus la bab nas de'i khye'u dbang thang chen po can
19b2('dul ba): mer bsregs kyang ma tshig pa mthu bo che zhig da ltar rgyal po'i pho brang na gso zhing 'dug go zhes smras pa dang / de khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i gan du song ste smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis mi rigs pa zhig byas so// ci zhig byas/ gcer bu pas bslus
19b3('dul ba): nas khyod kyis nga'i sring mo la sems can zhugs pa ji lta ji ltar 'chi bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byas pas 'chi ba'i dus la bab par byas so/ / des khye'u dbang thang can mer bsregs kyang ma tshig pa mthu bo che zhig da ltar rgyal po'i pho brang na gso zhing 'dug pa de la ni
19b4('dul ba): re zhig ci byar yang med de/ 'di ltar da yang gal te gzhon nu de blangs na de lta na legs/ 'on te mi len na ngas khyod gnyen du yang mi brtsi/ rabs yig kyang dor zhing lam po che dang / srang dang lam gyi sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo dag tu yang khyim bdag shin
19b5('dul ba): tu bzang pos bdag gi sring mo bsad de/ chung ma gsod pa 'di la sus kyang gtam 'dre bar mi bya'o zhes mi snyan pa bsgrag cing rgyal po'i gnod pa yang byed du gzhug go zhes smras pa dang / des de thos nas skrag ste/ de skad smras pa dang sbyar na bdag la de ltar byed
19b6('dul ba): par nges so snyam nas/ de rgyal po'i gan du song ste rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/ lha bdag gi nye du po'i mchid nas da yang gal te gzhon nu de blangs na de lta na legs/ 'on te mi len na ngas khyod gnyen du yang mi brtsi/ rabs yig kyang dor zhing /
19b7('dul ba): lam po che dang / srang dang lam gyi sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo dag tu yang khyim bdag shin tu bzang pos bdag gi sring mo bsad de chung ma gsod pa 'di la sus kyang gtam 'dre bar mi bya'o zhes mi snyan pa bsgrag cing rgyal po'i gnod pa yang byed du gzhug go zhes mchi bas/
20a1('dul ba): de'i slad du lhas gzhon nu me skyes bdag la stsal ba'i rigs so// rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag gzhon nu me skyes ngas khyod la blangs pa ma yin gyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis nga la gtad pa yin pas khyod la gal te gzhon nu dgos na gzhon nu'i ched du
20a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la sngar zhus shig/ de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song nas zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi nye du po'i mchid nas da yang gal te gzhon nu de blangs na de lta na legs/ 'on te mi len na ngas khyod
20a3('dul ba): gnyen du yang mi brtsi/ rabs yig kyang dor zhing / lam po che dang / srang dang / lam gyi sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo dag tu yang khyim bdag shin tu bzang pos bdag gi sring mo bsad de/ chung ma gsod pa 'di la sus kyang gtam 'dre bar mi bya'o zhes mi snyan pa bsgrag cing /
20a4('dul ba): rgyal po'i gnod pa yang byed du gzhug go zhes mchi bas/ de'i slad du gzhon nu me skyes bdag la stsal ba'i rigs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis gal te khyim bdag shin tu bzang po gzhon nu me skyes ma thob na khrag tsha ba skyugs nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas
20a5('dul ba): skabs de lta bu yod par gzigs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la rgyal po gzugs can snying po la nga'i bkas a rog gya zhes byos la 'di skad ces rgyal po chen po khyim bdag shin tu bzang po la gzhon nu me skyes byin cig/ gal te khyim
20a6('dul ba): bdag shin tu bzang po gzhon nu me skyes ma thob na khrag tsha ba skyugs nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs de lta bu yod par 'gyur ro zhes kyang bsgo shig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' mnyan nas
20a7('dul ba): rgyal po gzugs can snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod la rgyal po chen po a rog gya zhes bka' stsal te/ rgyal po chen po khyim bdag shin tu bzang po la gzhon nu me skyes
20b1('dul ba): byin cig/ gal te khyim bdag shin tu bzang po gzhon nu me skyes ma thob na khrag tsha ba skyugs nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs de lta bu yod par 'gyur ro zhes kyang bka' stsal to// rgyal pos smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan
20b2('dul ba): 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin 'tshal lo/ / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyal po chen po a rog gya zhes smras te song ngo // rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag gzhon nu 'di ngas bskyed de yid du 'ong zhing sdug pa yin pas dam tshig bcas la sbyin par bya ste/ nyi ma re re la yang dus gsum
20b3('dul ba): gsum du nga blta ba'i phyir gtong na sbyin par bya'o/ / des smras pa/ lha khyod kyi spyan sngar mi gtang na gzhan su'i thad du gtang bar bgyi/ gtang bar 'tshal lo// rgyal pos de rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te glang po che la bskyon nas btang ngo // 'di ltar 'jig rten pa rnams kyi kun du spyod pa ni ji skad
20b4('dul ba): du pha gson pa de srid du bu'i ming mi sgrogs so/ / ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag shin tu bzang po 'chi ba'i dus byas nas gzhon nu me skyes pha'i khyim na gnas par gyur te/ de sangs rgyas la mngon par dad/ chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad/ sangs rgyas la skyabs su song / chos
20b5('dul ba): dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song ngo / / des khyim bdag shin tu bzang pos phyogs gang du bdag gi ma bsad pa'i phyogs der gtsug lag khang rtsig tu bcug nas yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par sbyar te phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la phul nas 'di ltar gnas brtan dag gis kyang mdo sde dag la
20b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na dku mnyed pa'i tshal na bzhugs so zhes nye bar sbyar to/ / khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i mi zho shas 'tsho ba yul gzhan du dong ba dag gis khyim bdag shin tu bzang po ni 'chi ba'i dus la bab po// gzhon nu me skyes ni rang gi khyim na gnas te/ de sangs rgyas la
20b7('dul ba): mngon par dad/ chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad/ sangs rgyas la skyabs su song / chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song ngo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang de dag gis tsan dan sa mchog pa'i lhung bzed cig rin po che dag gis bkang ste khyim bdag me skyes la skyes su bskur ro//
21a1('dul ba): des kyang de shing ring po'i rtse mo la btags te bzhag nas/ 'di skad ces 'di sus kyang skas dang / ya gad dang / kyo ba tang dag gis blang bar mi bya'i/ 'di ltar dge sbyong ngam bram ze gang dag rdzu 'phrul che ba'am/ mthu che ba/ de dag las 'ga' zhig gis len na des
21a2('dul ba): ni 'di ci bder khyer la rag go zhes dril bsgrags pa yang byas so/ / gzhan mu stegs can rnams nang par sngar langs nas chu ngogs dag tu nye reg byed du 'dong ba de dag gis mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang khyim bdag me skyes la smras pa/ khyim bdag 'di ci yin/ des de dag la rgyas par bsnyad
21a3('dul ba): pa dang / de dag gis smras pa// khyim bdag khyod shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams la mngon par dad pas de dag nyid len par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas dong ngo // ji tsam na dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa de dag gis de mthong nas de dag gis
21a4('dul ba): kyang khyim bdag me skyes la smras pa/ khyim bdag 'di ci yin/ des de dag la de kho na bzhin du rgyas par bsnyad pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gis yon tan ni bcab par bya/ skyon ni bsgrag par bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/ ji lhung
21a5('dul ba): bzed tsam gyi ched du bdag nyid bstan par bya'am zhes smras nas dong ngo / / ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung stobs bcu pa de phyogs der 'ongs te/ khyim bdag la smras pa/ khyim bdag 'di ci yin/ des ji lta bu yin pa smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung stobs bcu pas bsams pa/
21a6('dul ba): bdag gis thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i nyon mongs pa'i tshogs rnams spangs shing bor la bsal cing sbyang ba byas na khyim bdag gis bdag mu stegs can dang rdzu 'phrul 'gran par chad kyis de'i phyir 'di'i yid mgu bar bya'o snyam nas/ des lag pa glang po che'i sna lta bu brkyang ste lhung bzed
21a7('dul ba): de blangs nas des de khyer te gtsug lag khang du song ngo / / de la dge slong dag gis smras pa/ gnas brtan khyod kyi tsan dan sa mchog pa'i lhung bzed 'di ga las mchis/ des ji ltar gyur pa brjod pa dang / dge slong dag gis smras pa/ gnas brtan khyod lhung bzed tsam gyi ched du khyim pa'i mdun
21b1('dul ba): du rdzu 'phrul rnam par bstan du rung ngam/ de tshe dang ldan pa dag rung yang bla mi rung yang bla ste byas zin pas da ci byar yang med do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis khyim pa'i mdun du rdzu 'phrul
21b2('dul ba): rnam par bstan par mi bya'o/ / rnam par ston na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// gzhan yang lhung bzed rnam pa bzhi po gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai DUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa dang / gzhan yang lhung bzed rnam pa bzhi po ra gan dang /
21b3('dul ba): zangs dang / khar ba dang / shing las byas pa dag las 'di ltar lhung bzed snga ma bzhi po gang dag yin pa de dag ni ma blangs pa yang blang bar mi bya la/ blangs pa yang gtang bar bya'o// lhung bzed phyi ma bzhi po gang dag yin pa de dag ni ma blangs pa ni blang bar mi bya zhing blangs pa na sman phor du longs
21b4('dul ba): spyad pas spyad par bya ba yin no/ / 'di ltar lcags dang / sa'i lhung bzed gnyis ni byin gyis brlab tu rung ba dag yin no// de nas dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag me skyes lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur nas/ rgyal po'i khab dang tsam pa dag gi bar na sho gam gyi gnas shig yod pa de'i
21b5('dul ba): sho gam pa 'chi ba'i dus la bab nas de gnod sbyin gdug pa zhig tu skyes pa dang / des bu'i rmi lam du 'di skad ces bu khyod kyis gnas 'dir gnod sbyin gyi rten 'dzugs su chug la der dril yang gyis la thogs shig dang / gang gi tshe der su dag zong las sho gam mi 'jal bar 'gro bar byed pa
21b6('dul ba): de'i tshe dril de sgra 'byin par byed cing / de dag phyir ldog pa las sho gam chod par 'gyur ro zhes bstan to// des gnyen bshes dang / nye du dang / rtsa lag dag la rmi lam de bzlas nas nyi ma dang / tshes grangs dang / yud tsam dang / gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / dus shis pa
21b7('dul ba): la bab pa'i tshe gnas der gnod sbyin gyi rten 'dzugs su bcug nas der dril yang byas te btags so/ / grong khyer tsam pa na bram ze zhig gis rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs pa dang / bram ze mo des bsams pa/ bdag bram zes thabs de dang de dag gis bsgrubs pa'i nor dag spyod
22a1('dul ba): cing las ci yang mi byed par 'dug pa ni bdag gi tshul dang mthun pa ma yin no snyam nas/ de tshong dus su song ste ras bal nyos nas sel gyis zhag par byas shing bkal te tha ga pa mkhas pa la kAr ShA pa Na stong ri ba'i ras zung gcig 'thag tu bcug go// de nas des
22a2('dul ba): bram ze la smras pa/ ras zung 'di kAr ShA pa Na stong ri ba lags kyis/ tshong dus su bzhud la gang dag kAr ShA pa Na stong gis 'jal ba la ni stsol cig/ gal te des mi 'jal na tshong 'dus ma yin no zhes bsgrags nas gzhan du bzhud par mdzod cig/ des de khyer te tshong 'dus su song
22a3('dul ba): ba na kAr ShA pa Na stong gis nyo ba su yang med nas/ des tshong 'dus ma yin no zhes bsgrags te/ ras zung de gdugs kyi rtsa ba'i nang du bcug ste 'gron pa dag dang lhan cig rgyal po'i khab tu song ngo // ji tsam na rim gyis sho gam gyi gnas su phyin pa dang / sho gam pas 'gron pa de dag la sho gam
22a4('dul ba): bcad pa na de dag gis sho gam phul nas dong ngo / / de na dril sgra 'byin par byed nas sho gam pa dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag dril 'di ltar sgra 'byin pa las na 'gron pa dag gis sho gam legs par ma phul gor ma chag gis/ yang sho gam gcad do zhes de dag gis 'gron pa dag yang phyir
22a5('dul ba): bkug ste btsal na sho gam ma phul ba 'ga' yang med do/ / de dag dong ba dang yang dril sgra 'byin pa nyid du byed nas/ de dag gis 'gron pa dag yang phyir bkug ste btsal na sho gam ma phul ba 'ga' yang med par gyur nas/ 'gron pa dag deng la khyed cag chom po byed par sems sam/ ci na yang dang
22a6('dul ba): yang du phyir 'gugs par byed ces smod par byed do/ / de dag gis 'gron pa de dag tshoms gnyis su byas te bkye ba dang / tshoms gang gi nang na bram ze de med pa dag ni de bzhin dong ngo // tshoms cig shos 'dong ba na dril de de bzhin du sgra 'byin par byed nas de dag gis de dag kyang de bzhin du tshoms gnyis
22a7('dul ba): su byas shing byas shing bkye ba dang / tha mar bram ze de gcig pu nyi tshe lus par gyur nas de de dag gis bzung ngo // des bdag la cung zad kyang med kyis tshol cig ces smras pa dang / de dag gis btsal na ci yang med nas btang ba na yang dril de sgra 'byin pa nyid du byed do// de dag gis bram ze de yang phyir
22b1('dul ba): bkug nas smras pa/ kye bram ze lha'i byin gyi rlabs ni de ltar gyur na khyod bden par smros shig dang / kho bo cag khyod la sho gam mi len to// des smras pa/ bden pa mi len tam/ de dag gis smras pa/ mi len to// des gdugs kyi rtsa ba'i nang nas ras zung de phyung ste bstan to// de dag kye ma
22b2('dul ba): lha'i byin gyi rlabs ni 'di 'dra'o zhes ngo mtshar chen po skyes par gyur nas/ de dag gis de'i ras ya gcig phye ste lha la bstan to// bram zes smras pa/ kye khyed cag na re sho gam mi len to zhes zer na da thams cad 'phrog gam/ de dag gis smras pa/ bram ze nged cag len par mi byed de/ lha'i byin
